description: The system shall continuously monitor vehicle speed during all operating modes
The system shall apply emergency braking automatically when a forward collision is imminent
The system shall issue a lane departure warning when the vehicle unintentionally crosses lane markings
The system shall detect and track pedestrians and cyclists within the vehicle operating zone
The system shall operate correctly across an ambient temperature range of -40°C to 85°C
The system shall provide real-time sensor data to the central processing unit with latency below 20ms
The system shall alert the driver through audible and visual notifications for all critical safety events
